nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
<!-- Policy app identification https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=PullRequestIssueManagement. -->
we don't plan to deliver any changes to vs17.9

> we don't plan to deliver any changes to vs17.9

@YuliiaKovalova can you disable the darc subscriptions to 17.9 so these don't pop up any more? Feel free to reach out with questions.

> > we don't plan to deliver any changes to vs17.9
> 
> @YuliiaKovalova can you disable the darc subscriptions to 17.9 so these don't pop up any more? Feel free to reach out with questions.

It's a great idea, thank you!
I have disabled it for nuget.client too.
